name: Chainlink Chains
text: (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; add 1 "Chainlink Chaining Changing" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY: You can gain 1000 LP. If this effect resolves in a Chain Link of 3 or higher, you can add this card from your GY to your hand. You can only activate this effect of "Chainlink Chains" once per turn.
